summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Camp Baraisa management system - Iteration 5. Backend: 13/14 tests passed (93%). Frontend: All requested features verified working. Unified Camper model with embedded parent info is working correctly.

minor.issue: Endpoint not found - actual endpoint is /api/exports/campers (note the 's')

issues: Existing test campers show 'No parent info' because they were created before the unified model - this is expected for legacy data

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with credentials admin@campbaraisa.com/testpassword123
Backend: Auth /me endpoint returns admin info
Backend: Dashboard stats endpoint returns camper counts and billing totals
Backend: GET /campers returns list of campers
Backend: POST /campers creates camper with embedded parent info (unified model)
Backend: PUT /campers/{id}/status updates camper status
Backend: POST /applications (public endpoint) creates camper with 'Applied' status
Backend: GET /activities returns activity log for camper
Backend: POST /activities/note adds manual note to activity log
Backend: GET /kanban returns board with 10 status columns
Backend: Kanban camper cards include parent contact info
Backend: Global search finds campers by name
Frontend: Login page loads and authenticates correctly
Frontend: Dashboard displays stats (Total Campers, Total Invoiced, Total Collected, Outstanding)
Frontend: Campers page loads with unified camper data
Frontend: Add Camper form includes embedded parent info fields (Parent Email, Father's Info, Mother's Info)
Frontend: Clicking camper row navigates to CamperDetail page
Frontend: CamperDetail shows unified camper+parent data with tabs (Basic Info, Parent, Yeshiva, Emergency, Medical)
Frontend: Activity Log section visible on CamperDetail page
Frontend: Adding a note to activity log works - note appears immediately
Frontend: Kanban board loads with 10 status columns and camper cards
Frontend: Kanban cards show camper info with outstanding balance
Frontend: Public application form at /apply is accessible without login
Frontend: Application form multi-step wizard works (4 steps)
Frontend: Data Center page loads with column selection and export options
critical_code_review_comments: Unified Camper model is correctly implemented - parent info embedded in camper documents
Activity log is working with proper action types (status_changed, note_added, email_queued, etc.)
Public application endpoint correctly creates campers with 'Applied' status
Kanban board correctly displays all 10 status columns with camper cards
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data. Note: Existing test campers don't have embedded parent info (legacy data)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working: Unified Camper model with embedded parent info, Activity Log with manual notes, Public application form at /apply, Kanban board with 10 status columns. The existing test campers show 'No parent info' because they were created before the unified model - this is expected behavior for legacy data. New campers created via Add Camper form or public application will have embedded parent info.

unified_camper_model.details: Camper model includes embedded parent info (parent_email, father_*, mother_*). No separate parent fetch needed.

add_camper_form.details: Form includes Parent/Guardian Information section with Parent Email, Father's Info (First Name, Last Name, Cell), Mother's Info (optional)

camper_detail_page.details: Shows unified camper+parent data with tabs: Basic Info, Parent, Yeshiva, Emergency, Medical. Activity Log section with Add Note feature.

activity_log.details: Shows activity history (status changes, emails queued, notes added). Add Note feature works - notes appear immediately with timestamp and admin name.

kanban_board.details: 10 status columns (Applied, Accepted, Check/Unknown, Invoice Sent, Payment Plan - Request, Payment Plan Running, Sending Check, Partial Paid, Partial Paid & Committed, Paid in Full). Cards show camper info with outstanding balance.

public_application_form.details: Accessible at /apply without login. 4-step wizard: 1) Camper & Parent Info, 2) Address & Yeshiva, 3) Camp History & Emergency, 4) Medical Info. Submitting creates camper with 'Applied' status.

data_center.details: Shows all camper data with column selection (by category: Basic, Parent, Address, Yeshiva, Medical, Emergency, Billing, etc.). Export button available.

dashboard.details: Shows stats: Total Campers (2), Total Invoiced ($5,000), Total Collected ($1,000), Outstanding ($4,000). Status Summary and Recent Applications sections.
